scheme_name: Gunwatta Evam Navachar Nishulk Pathya Pustak Yojana
brief_description: Under "Gunwatta Evam Navachar Nishulk Pathya Pustak Yojana", free textbooks are provided to all boys and girls studying from Class 1 to 8 in government and government-aided schools and recognized madrasas that implement the state-prescribed curriculum.
detailed_description: &quot;Gunwatta Evam Navachar Nishulk Pathya Pustak Yojana&quot; implemented by the Department of Education, Uttarakhand, ensures the free distribution of textbooks each year to all students from Class 1 to 8. This initiative applies to government schools, government-aided institutions, and recognized madrasas that follow the curriculum prescribed by the state government. There is no selection process involved; all enrolled students, both boys and girls, automatically receive the textbooks at no cost.
benefits: Textbook Distribution: Free textbooks are provided annually to eligible students.
eligibility_criteria: The applicant must be a student The applicant must be studying in classes 1 to 8. The applicant must be enrolled in a government school, government-aided school, or recognized madrasa implementing the state curriculum.

steps: No formal application is required. Textbooks are distributed free of cost at the beginning of the academic session to the eligible students enrolled in a government school, government-aided school, or recognized madrasa.
